creator: takashi.asfbugzilla@tks.st
text:
current:
apr_status_t apr_generate_random_bytes(unsigned char *buf, apr_size_t length);

Now we have to cast when passing buffer.
More useful if the first argument type is void pointer.

I'm not sure how this change breaks API/ABI compatibility.

creator: rpluem@apache.org
text: IMHO that would break the ABI/API promise. So it would be a 2.0 issue.
